column5: I will be going on my yearly trip to nova scotia this summer, we will spend one week in the bay of fundy, I have a secret trout spot and a not so secret striped bass spot that i usually fish with mixed results, for the other week we will be in the White Point resort on the south shore, I do not know this area at all, there are a few saltwater marshes near by but I can't find any info on fishing cold water salt marshes, can someone help me out? Will salmon start running that early?
